item.title: Mentioned by Spruce Grove Examiner
item.description:
Ambrose ready for new role as health minister
ANDRE FORGET QMI Agency Ministers Rob Nicholson, Peter McKay, Rona Ambrose and Diane Finley were at Rideau Hall for Prime Minister Stephen Harper's cabinet shuffle in Ottawa on Monday. Tweet · Bookmark and Share. Change text size for the story. Print. Report an error. Edmonton - Spruce Grove MP Rona Ambrose was named the federal government's new health minister by Prime Minister Stephen Harper on July 15. Previously the Minister of Public Works and Government Services as well as Minister for ...

item.title: Mentioned by Vancouver Sun
item.description:
NDP MP hopes cyberbullying bill will pass
Introduced as Bill C-540 in June, Chisholm said the response from government was initially cool with then-justice minister Rob Nicholson evading his request to support the bill and instead blaming the NDP for failing to back other justice reforms. But after a ...
